duties_responsibilities.duty: Benchmark competitor vehicles relevant to projects and set class-leading fit and finish targets.
Develop critical sections to both Interior and Exterior interfaces and record in a Build Objectives document.
Work with Design Engineering, Dimensional, and manufacturing teams to ensure achievable targets in volume production.
Utilize Cubing Reference Models, Master Fixtures, and other tools to ensure the highest levels of craftsmanship in production.
Propose alternative surface, cutline, and interface execution to Styling for better craftsmanship results.
Evaluate and support the improvement of sensory aspects of products during the production process.
Work closely with suppliers and manage product introductions.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in an Engineering discipline (Automotive experience preferred)
